channel.title: Only read this if your smart =P
channel.description:
I want to put my client on my website so my players can download it and play the game. But i don't want them tampering with any of the files.
Now i can't figure out how to put it into a .jar file and nobody seems to be of any help, but i highlighted everything in the folder except the "run" file, and clicked on properties. I checked the box "Hidden" and it made all of the files invisible.
The client runs up as normal and is perfect, though if i put it up for people to download, will they stay hidden? Or will they re-appear for them?
Also, how do you un-do this? Lmao :|

item.title: Only read this if your smart =P
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

Everythings great, but i still don’t understand what to put for Main-Class:

People keep saying to put “client” and i do and i get the simple error.

Cannot find Main Class. Program will exit.

What am i actually suppose to put?

Read full topic
item.source: Only read this if your smart =P

item.title: Only read this if your smart =P
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

It’s easy. Just read what it asks for.

Here I’ll help

Output File: - PATH OF OUTPUT FILE
application.jar - JAR NAME
Input Directory - PATH OF ALL CLASS FILES YOU WANT JAR’D.
Jar Compresson Rate: 9

Manifest Template - Click it maybe?
Main-Class: - THE MAIN CLASS (THE CLASS WITH THE MAIN() METHOD)

Read full topic

item.title: Only read this if your smart =P
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Bloody Wolf:

if i put it up for people to download, will they stay hidden? Or will they re-appear for them?

Depends.

Bloody Wolf:

Also, how do you un-do this? Lmao

Start - > Control Panel - > Folder Options -> View - > Hidden Files And Folders -> Show Hidden Files And Folders

Read full topic
item.source: Only read this if your smart =P
